publicationPlace: Jmprynted at London in Aldersgate strete
title: A table instructiue whan and how a man may c√µnyngly let bloude of all the necessary veynes of mans body very profitable for all chirurgeons and barbers..
author: Geminus, Thomas, d. 1562.
notes: An engraving accompanied by text in two columns which are pasted along the sides. The engraving is entitled "A figure for necessary lettyng off bloude" and signed "Thomas Geminus Physition". The text is the same as that of STC 564.6 but in a different typesetting.
Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
